alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Lander Foothills; Natrona County Lower Elevations; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 2:34AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches for Dubois. Total snow accumulations of 1 foot to 3 feet in the Wind River Mountains East. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches for all other locations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, Tuesday night into Wednesday afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of central Wyoming, including the cities of Lander, Riverton, Casper, and Shoshoni. * WHEN...From 5 PM Tuesday to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility and drifting.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
